useCase.name: Provisioning Fault Management Job and Report
useCase.description: Register listeners, create job, generate data, create report, collect data, and get report
useCase.trigger: Business User initiates fault management job and report creation

mainSequence.step: Business User registers listeners with Hub for notifications
Business User creates a fault management job
System Operator Framework creates the fault management job
Fault Management Job is in progress
Fault Management Job creates a report
Fault Management Report is in progress
Fault Management Job receives the report
Fault Management Job is completed or scheduled
System Operator Framework retrieves the report
Business User receives the Fault Management Report
